Title: Silverlight Cairngorm
Description: Port Cairngorm micro-architecture from Flex ActionScript to Silverlight C#. Includes all source code and sample applications. Tested with Silverlight 2 and Silverlight 3 with sample projects, also updated for Silverlight 4 and Visual Studio 2010.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Port Cairngorm micro-architecture from Flex ActionScript to Silverlight C#. Includes all source code and sample applications. Tested with Silverlight 2 and Silverlight 3 with sample projects, also updated for Silverlight 4 and Visual Studio 2010.

Dec.21.2009 Updates for Silverlight 4 and Visual Studio 2010
All details are documented in: http://www.codeproject.com/KB/silverlight/SLCairngorm2010.aspx


Jul.09.2009 Using Silverlight Cairngorm in an Azure project with .NET RIA Services:
Building a 3-Tier App with Silverlight 3, .NET RIA Services and Azure Table Storage
http://www.codeproject.com/KB/silverlight/Azurelight.aspx

Feb.15.2009 Here is an easy while reliable solution for building
Building Modular Silverlight Applications:
